title: Anant Ambani's Pet Dog, Happy Passed Away, Family Pays Tribute With An Emotional Note, 'Live On...'
text:
Mukesh and Nita Ambani's younger son, Anant Ambani, is a huge animal lover. He recently inaugurated the Vantara animal conservation and rehabilitation centre in Jamnagar, Gujarat. The businessman also had a great companion at home, who he deeply loved. Anant Ambani's pet dog, Happy, passed away
Anant Ambani's fur baby, Happy, is no longer with us. The dog was deeply loved by all his family members, especially Anant. It was Viral Bhayani's Instagram handle that first shared the saddening news of Happy's demise. The post revealed that Happy passed away on April 30, 2025, and revealed that the family had paid their heartfelt tribute to the dog, who was considered one of the most loved members of their family. ADVT.
ADVT.
TRENDING NOW The Ambani family's heartfelt tribute to Happy
It was actor, Veer Pahariya who shared some glimpses from the emotional tribute. He shared a picture of a beautifully decorated memorial created by the Ambani family in loving memory of Happy. The first image features a long note by the family sharing how much they loved and adored their pet dog and how saddened they are by Happy's passing.
The Ambani family, with heavy hearts, shared the news of the passing of their pet dog, Happy. They revealed that he was more than just a dog to them; he was like a family member, whose presence gave them constant, unconditional love and comfort. The note further shared that the happiness their fur baby provided would never be forgotten, and he would continue to live on in their hearts. The note was quoted as saying:
"In the loving memory of beloved Happy. It is with heavy heart that we share the sad news of the passing of our beloved dog, Happy. More than just a pet, he was family- a loyal companion, a source of comfort, and a constant presence of unconditional love. The joy HAPPY brought into our lives will never be forgotten. From the playful moments to the quiet times of companionship, His memory will forever live in our hearts. Run free, sweet Happy. You will be deeply missed, always loved and never forgotten."
ADVT.
The picture also featured another poster with an adorable picture of Happy. The poster further expressed the family's sadness. The Ambani family referred to the passing of their beloved Happy as a loss. Veer Pahariya also shared a picture with Happy in his bed. The note was quoted as saying: advertisement.

Anant Ambani's Happy owned a Mercedes-Benz G400d luxury SUV
Happy lived a luxurious life, just like the other members of the Ambani family . He was provided with all the amenities and comfort, including a personal car for travelling. The Ambani family's beloved pet, a golden retriever named Happy, travelled in a Mercedes-Benz G400d luxury SUV, priced at Rs 2.55 to Rs. 3 crore in India. While the family's security convoy features several prestigious G63 AMG SUVs, the G400d stands out as a distinctive diesel variant which was exclusively for Happy. ADVT.
Team BollywoodShaadis extend our heartfelt condolences on the passing of Happy.
